Observ\xE2nd \u0219i \xEEnv\u0103\u021B\xE2nd de la paletele ei infinite, putem crea designuri care nu doar arat\u0103 frumos, ci rezoneaz\u0103 profund cu percep\u021Bia uman\u0103."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 mb-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white/10 rounded-lg p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"text-lg font-semibold text-white mb-2",children:"\uD83E\uDD8B Adaptare"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-white/70 text-sm",children:"Func\u021Bia culorii"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 justify-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/joc'),className:"bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-500 to-indigo-500 text-white px-6 py-3 rounded-xl font-semibold hover:from-purple-600 hover:to-indigo-600 transition-all duration-300 text-lg",children:"Felicit\u0103ri! 'adaptation', 'inspiration']; const scrollPosition = window.scrollY + 200; sections.forEach(section => { const element = document.getElementById(section); if (element) { const offsetTop = element.offsetTop; const offsetBottom = offsetTop + element.offsetHeight; if (scrollPosition >= offsetTop && scrollPosition < offsetBottom) { setActiveSection(section); } } }); }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); const scrollToSection = (sectionId) => { const element =
